Name: Articles

Integration Errors","metricFieldValue":"Integration Errors"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  a.Oid,
		a.[Name],
		c.[Name] as Company,
		a.Active,
		a.InternalService,
		a.DepartmentRequired,
		a.UnitHour as UnitHour,
		a.DefaultMargin,
		a.ExternalId,
		a.VatDeductiblePercentage as VatDeductiblePercentage,
		ag.[Name] as ArticleGroup
from Article a
Inner Join Company c on a.Company=c.Oid
Left Outer Join ArticleGroup ag on (ag.Oid=a.ArticleGroup)"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]
